prompts: {#character} in {#setting} {#method} and is isekai'd as a result, becoming {#form} in {#setting}.

setting.name: Setting
options: a ghost town in the middle of the desert

character.name: Character
options: the most depressed teenager you have literally ever seen

method.name: Transformation Method
options: falls into a vat of toxic waste
wears affirming clothes as 'crossdressing' one too many times

form.name: New Form
options: {an orange|a silver|a black|a colourful}-furred kitsune with {1|2|3|4|5|6|7|8|9} tails
